text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Mr President 

We don't need a Vaccine!

Mr President. 

Please mass Distribute HCQ and Zinc to the American People so that they can take it at the onset of Covid-19 symptoms and return America back to work before it is too late!

HCQ is the Game Changer!
